description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市西城区的清朝王府，曾为和珅、永璘、奕䜣等人的府邸，现为对公众开放的博物馆及全国重点文物保护单位。
description.en: A princely mansion of the Qing dynasty located in Xicheng District, Beijing, China. It was formerly the residence of officials such as Heshen, Yonglin, and Yixin. It is now a museum open to the public and a Major Historical and Cultural Site Protected at the National Level.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣，恭王府的前身“十公主府”的建造者和首位主人。
description.en: An official of the Qing dynasty, the builder and first owner of the "Tenth Princess Mansion," the predecessor of Prince Gong's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇帝，在和珅死后将其府邸赐予庆郡王永璘。
description.en: An emperor of the Qing dynasty who, after Heshen's death, bestowed his mansion upon Prince Qing, Yonglin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝庆郡王，恭王府的第二位主人，当时府邸称为庆王府。
description.en: Prince Qing of the Qing dynasty, the second owner of Prince Gong's Mansion, which was then known as Prince Qing's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇帝，将庆王府赐予恭亲王奕䜣。
description.en: An emperor of the Qing dynasty who bestowed Prince Qing's Mansion upon Prince Gong, Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝恭亲王，恭王府的第三代主人，府邸因其而得名“恭王府”。
description.en: Prince Gong of the Qing dynasty, the third-generation owner of the mansion, which was named "Prince Gong's Mansion" after him.

description.zh-cn: 恭亲王奕䜣之孙，将恭王府抵押给天主教会。
description.en: Grandson of Prince Gong, Yixin, who mortgaged Prince Gong's Mansion to the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际性宗教组织，曾通过抵押获得恭王府的所有权。
description.en: An international religious organization that once acquired ownership of Prince Gong's Mansion through a mortgage.

description.zh-cn: 一所天主教大学，曾于1937年购买并持有恭王府。
description.en: A Catholic university that purchased and owned Prince Gong's Mansion in 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院首任总理，曾多次指示要将恭王府对社会开放，是推动其保护与开放的关键人物。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who repeatedly instructed that Prince Gong's Mansion be opened to the public, making him a key figure in promoting its preservation and opening.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，遵照周恩来遗愿，于1979年开始推动恭王府的腾退工作。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who, following Zhou Enlai's last wishes, began to promote the relocation work of Prince Gong's Mansion in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国艺术研究院院长，通过谈判完成了恭王府腾退工作的最后一步。
description.en: Then-president of the Chinese National Academy of Arts, who completed the final step of the relocation work for Prince Gong's Mansion through negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在北京举办的夏季奥林匹克运动会，恭王府在此期间完成修缮并全面向公众开放。
description.en: The Summer Olympic Games held in Beijing in 2008, during which Prince Gong's Mansion completed its restoration and fully opened to the public.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，主管文化艺术事务，在恭王府的腾退、修复和管理中扮演了核心角色。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural and artistic affairs, which played a central role in the relocation, restoration, and management of Prince Gong's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 一所艺术院校，曾于1950年起占用恭王府。
description.en: An art academy that occupied Prince Gong's Mansion starting in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 一所音乐高等院校，曾长期占用恭王府，直至1988年搬出。
description.en: An institution of higher education for music that occupied Prince Gong's Mansion for a long period until it moved out in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家级艺术科研机构，曾占用恭王府，其职工宿舍是最后一批搬离的住户之一。
description.en: China's national-level arts research institution, which once occupied Prince Gong's Mansion. Its staff dormitories were among the last households to be relocated.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管全国公安工作的国务院组成部门，曾占用恭王府后花园作为宿舍，并参与了后期的腾退修复委员会。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of national public security work. It once used the rear garden of Prince Gong's Mansion for dormitories and participated in the subsequent relocation and restoration committee.

description.zh-cn: 负责中央国家机关事务管理的机构，在恭王府腾退工作中曾牵头召开会议并参与修复委员会。
description.en: The agency responsible for the administration of central state organs' affairs, which led meetings and participated in the restoration committee for the relocation of Prince Gong's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性博物馆行业组织。
description.en: The national industry organization for museums in China.

description.zh-cn: 与恭王府合作举办“非遗演出季”的学术组织。
description.en: An academic organization that collaborates with Prince Gong's Mansion to hold the "Intangible Cultural Heritage Performance Season."

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 奉旨修建了恭王府的前身“十公主府”，并成为其首位主人。
description.en: Constructed the predecessor of Prince Gong's Mansion, the "Tenth Princess Mansion," under imperial decree and became its first owner.

description.zh-cn: 在和珅死后，将其府邸（后来的恭王府）赐予庆郡王永璘。
description.en: After Heshen's death, bestowed his mansion (later Prince Gong's Mansion) upon Prince Qing, Yonglin.

description.zh-cn: 将庆王府（后来的恭王府）赐予恭亲王奕䜣。
description.en: Bestowed Prince Qing's Mansion (later Prince Gong's Mansion) upon Prince Gong, Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 作为府邸主人入住，府邸从此得名“恭王府”。
description.en: Moved in as the master of the mansion, and it has since been named "Prince Gong's Mansion."

description.zh-cn: 溥伟是奕䜣的孙子。
description.en: Puwei is the grandson of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 将恭王府和花园抵押给天主教会，导致府邸所有权旁落。
description.en: Mortgaged Prince Gong's Mansion and its garden to the Catholic Church, leading to the loss of ownership.

description.zh-cn: 购买并拥有恭王府作为其校产。
description.en: Purchased and owned Prince Gong's Mansion as its campus property.

description.zh-cn: 占用恭王府，阻碍了其作为历史建筑的保护和对公众开放。
description.en: Occupied Prince Gong's Mansion, hindering its preservation as a historical building and its opening to the public.

description.zh-cn: 长期占用恭王府，阻碍了其作为历史建筑的保护和对公众开放。
description.en: Occupied Prince Gong's Mansion for a long period, hindering its preservation as a historical building and its opening to the public.

description.zh-cn: 长期占用恭王府，其住户是最后一批搬离者，阻碍了其作为历史建筑的保护和对公众开放。
description.en: Occupied Prince Gong's Mansion for a long period; its residents were among the last to move out, hindering its preservation as a historical building and its opening to the public.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 占用恭王府后花园作为宿舍，阻碍了其作为历史建筑的保护和对公众开放。
description.en: Used the rear garden of Prince Gong's Mansion for dormitories, hindering its preservation as a historical building and its opening to the public.

description.zh-cn: 多次嘱咐要将王府对社会开放，为王府的腾退和保护工作奠定了基础。
description.en: Repeatedly instructed that the mansion be opened to the public, laying the foundation for its relocation and preservation.

description.zh-cn: 遵照周恩来的遗愿，开始推动恭王府的腾退工作。
description.en: Following Zhou Enlai's last wishes, he began to promote the relocation work of Prince Gong's Mansion.

description.zh-cn: 牵头召开搬迁工作会议，并作为恭王府修复委员会成员，推动腾退与修复工作。
description.en: Led the relocation work meeting and, as a member of the Prince Gong's Mansion Restoration Committee, promoted the relocation and restoration work.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国文化部

description.zh-cn: 作为恭王府修复委员会核心成员，并于1987年正式接管，全面负责其腾退、修复与管理。
description.en: As a core member of the Prince Gong's Mansion Restoration Committee, and formally taking over in 1987, it was fully responsible for its relocation, restoration, and management.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国艺术研究院院长，通过谈判说服最后一个住户搬离，最终完成了王府的腾退工作。
description.en: As the president of the Chinese National Academy of Arts, he persuaded the last resident to move out through negotiations, finally completing the relocation work of the mansion.

description.zh-cn: 恭王府的全面修复工作在2008年北京奥运会举办时完成，并借此契机向公众完全开放。
description.en: The complete restoration of Prince Gong's Mansion was finished by the time of the 2008 Beijing Olympics, and it used this opportunity to fully open to the public.

description.zh-cn: 将文化部恭王府博物馆评为第三批国家一级博物馆，提升了其地位。
description.en: Rated the Prince Gong's Mansion Museum of the Ministry of Culture as a third-batch national first-grade museum, enhancing its status.

description.zh-cn: 与中国昆剧古琴研究会合作，在府内大戏楼共同举办“非遗演出季”。
description.en: Collaborates with the China Kunqu Opera and Guqin Research Association to co-host the "Intangible Cultural Heritage Performance Season" at the mansion's Grand Theatre.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国文化部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 文化部是国务院的组成部门，需向国务院报告工作，如恭王府搬迁完成情况。
description.en: The Ministry of Culture is a constituent department of the State Council and is required to report its work, such as the completion of the Prince Gong's Mansion relocation, to the State Council.
